SEARCH

Class FoodProductDAO

java.lang.Object
FoodProductDAO
public class FoodProductDAO extends Object
The FoodProductDAO class is the data access object that provides an interface to the foodproduct table in the SQLite database. It contains methods to retrieve, add, update and delete food products, as well as methods for filtering products by category and searching products by description
Version:
1.2
Author:
Chaima Jebri

    • findAllProducts

      public ArrayList<FoodProduct> findAllProducts()
      Retrieves all food products from the foodproduct table in the database
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all food products

    • findProduct

      public FoodProduct findProduct(int id)
      Retrieves a food product from the database based on its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the food product to retrieve
      Returns:
      The food product object, which can be null if not found in the database

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(int id)
      Deletes a food product from the database based on its ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the food product to delete
      Returns:
      True if the food product is successfully deleted, false if not

    • updateProduct

      public boolean updateProduct(FoodProduct product)
      Updates the information of a food product in the database
      Parameters:
      product - The food product with the new updated information
      Returns:
      True if the food product is successfully updated, false if not

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct(FoodProduct product)
      Adds a new food product to the foodproduct table in the database
      Parameters:
      product - The new food product object to add
      Returns:
      True if successfully added, false if not

    • filterProductsByCategory

      public ArrayList<FoodProduct> filterProductsByCategory(String category)
      Filters food products in the databases based on a specific category
      Parameters:
      category - the category used for filtering
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing food products with the specific category

    • searchProductsByDescription

      public ArrayList<FoodProduct> searchProductsByDescription(String search)
      Searches for food products in the database based on a search string with the product description
      Parameters:
      search - The search string used for matching descriptions.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing food products with the specific description matching the search string
